name: Ghost Scans
description:
Created as a companion art piece for a photographic project titled Ghost Scans.

40 minutes from start to finish. How and where you look will affect the end.

Music is available from my Bandcamp.

Controls:

• Use the Mouse to look.

• To Quit, use Command + Q.

System Requirements:

• Will run best on computers made after 2012.

• Windows version is untested.
